channel.description: Week 1 Announcements Russell Feldhausen Pronouns: he/him (785) 292-3121 (Call/Text) 2184 Engineering Hall (working remotely) russfeld AT ksu DOT edu https://russfeld.me - @russfeld Email Preferred What's New? 1 Module Due Each Week Late Work Penalty - 10% / Day Prototype Portion in Final Project Minor Changes in Each Lab 5 Interactive Discussions Lab Grading Schedule via Calendly Can Schedule Before Complete Requires 4 hours notice Zoom with Screen Share Cannot Change Once Started Discussions Will Schedule During First Week 1 Discussion Per Weeks 2 - 6 Submit Questions Prior Live Portion Via Zoom Attendance Recommended! Watch Video & Write Reaction Keep in Touch! Discussions on Discord https://discordbot.cs.ksu.edu Zoom Discussions "Tea Time" Office Hours Tuesday 3:30 | Friday 10:30 One-on-One Office Hours
